name: Topdown Showdown
description: The premier top down Smash inspired indie fighting game! Play with up to four players locally or online with our growing community of passionate players! 16 characters, colorful animations, plenty of modes to play, and an awesome single player story mode!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4ghz CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 GTX or AMD Radeon HD4850 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 320 MB available space
